bio.p1: I am a Software Engineer focused on the web ecosystem. My journey is driven by a desire to build applications that are not only performant but also robust and reliable. I specialize in TypeScript, React and Test Automation.
bio.p2: I distinguish myself by handling the full development lifecycle. Whether I'm building a responsive frontend interface or writing complex E2E test suites in WebdriverIO, I prioritize code quality and stability.
bio.p3: While my academic background is in Data Science (giving me strong analytical skills), my professional passion lies in Web Development and Quality Assurance.
